title: NthLayer MCP Server
description: Implement NthLayer as MCP server using FastMCP v2. Core tools: generate_spec, generate_dashboard, generate_alerts, generate_slo, validate_spec, lint_promql, verify_metrics, check_deploy, portfolio_status, slo_status, recommend_slo. Resources: nthlayer://services/{name}, nthlayer://templates/{tech}. Compose with official Grafana MCP (grafana/mcp-grafana) and PagerDuty MCP (PagerDuty/pagerduty-mcp-server) via FastMCP proxy. NOTE: Incident response capabilities (query logs, analyze incidents) are natural side effects of MCP composition but NOT a core focus - NthLayer is about prevention, not response.
